other_tests.findings: Small-vessel vasculitis with associated multiple intravascular thrombi consistent with leukocytoclastic vasculitis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Skin lesions resolved spontaneously, and neutropenia was corrected by treatment with filgrastim.

other_tests.findings: Organizing thrombi in small-caliber vessels associated with perivascular lymphocytic inflammatory cell infiltrates.
